   muneḥ prasādānmānyo 'sau kṛṣṇaḥ pāśupate dvijāḥ // LiP_1,108.8 //	muneH prasAdAt mAnyaH asO kRzNaH pASupate dvijAH // LiS _1,108.8 //
   tapasā tvekavarṣānte dṛṣṭvā devaṃ maheśvaram /	tapasA tu eka varza ante dRzwvA devam maheSvaram /
   sāṃbaṃ sagaṇamavyagraṃ labdhavānputramātmanaḥ // LiP_1,108.9 //	sa aMbam sa gaNam avyagram labDavAn putram AtmanaH // LiS _1,108.9 //
   tadāprabhṛti taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ /	tadA praBRti tam kRzNam munayaH saMSita vratAH /
   divyāḥ pāśupatāḥ sarve tasthuḥ saṃvṛtya sarvadā // LiP_1,108.10 //	divyAH pASupatAH sarve tasTuH saMvRtya sarvadA // LiS _1,108.10 //
   anyaṃ ca kathayiṣyāmi muktyarthaṃ prāṇināṃ sadā /	anyam ca kaTayizyAmi mukti arTam prANinAm sadA /
   sauvarṇīṃ mekhalāṃ kṛtvā ādhāraṃ daṇḍadhāraṇam // LiP_1,108.11 //	sOvarNIm meKalAm kRtvA ADAram daNxa DAraNam // LiS _1,108.11 //
   sauvarṇaṃ piṇḍikaṃ cāpi vyajanaṃ daṇḍameva ca /	sOvarNam piNxikam ca api vyajanam daNxam eva ca /
   naraiḥ striyātha vā kāryaṃ maṣībhājanalekhanīm // LiP_1,108.12 //	narEH striyA aTa vA kAryam mazI BAjana leKanIm // LiS _1,108.12 //
   kṣurāḥ kartarikā cāpi atha pātramathāpi vā /	kzurAH kartarikA ca api aTa pAtram aTa api vA /
   pāśupatāya dātavyaṃ bhasmoddhūlitavigrahaiḥ // LiP_1,108.13 //	pASupatAya dAtavyam Basma udDUlita vigrahEH // LiS _1,108.13 //
   sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi tāmraṃ vātha nivedayet /	sOvarNam rAjatam vA api tAmram vA aTa nivedayet /
   ātmavittānusāreṇa yoginaṃ pūjayedbudhaḥ // LiP_1,108.14 //	Atma vitta anusAreNa yoginam pUjayet buDaH // LiS _1,108.14 //
   te sarve pāpanirmuktāḥ samastakulasaṃyutāḥ /	te sarve pApa nirmuktAH samasta kula saMyutAH /
   yānti rudrapadaṃ divyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // LiP_1,108.15 //	yAnti rudra padam divyam na atra kAryA vicAraNA // LiS _1,108.15 //
   tasmādanena dānena gṛhastho mucyate bhavāt /	tasmAt anena dAnena gRhasTaH mucyate BavAt /
   yogināṃ saṃpradānena śivaḥ kṣipraṃ prasīdati // LiP_1,108.16 //	yoginAm saMpradAnena SivaH kzipram prasIdati // LiS _1,108.16 //
   rājyaṃ putraṃ dhanaṃ bhavyam aśvaṃ yānamathāpi vā /	rAjyam putram Danam Bavyam aSvam yAnam aTa api vA /
   sarvasvaṃ vāpi dātavyaṃ yadīcchenmokṣamuttamam // LiP_1,108.17 //	sarva svam vA api dAtavyam yadi icCet mokzam uttamam // LiS _1,108.17 //
   adhruveṇa śarīreṇa dhruvaṃ sādhyaṃ prayatnataḥ /	aDruveNa SarIreNa Druvam sADyam prayatnataH /
   bhavyaṃ pāśupataṃ nityaṃ saṃsārārṇavatārakam // LiP_1,108.18 //	Bavyam pASupatam nityam saMsAra arNava tArakam // LiS _1,108.18 //
   etadvaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ saṃkṣepānna ca saṃśayaḥ /	etat vaH kaTitam sarvam saMkzepAt na ca saMSayaH /
   yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // LiP_1,108.19 //	yaH paWet SRNuyAt vA api vizNu lokam sa gacCati // LiS _1,108.19 //
   iti śrīliṅgamahāpurāṇe pūrvabhāge 'ṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	iti SrI liFga mahApurANe pUrva BAge azwottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
